name: talkSchuri
commands: Which topic do you want to ask about?
Lilith...We learned a little bit about her,|Yet all we've got is more questions.|Why is she trying to resurrect the demon king?|Could she have been corrupted by the Lathrasir?
When we learned about the Lathrasir...|I thought that was the source of her power.|The fact that she didn't take it with her...|What on earth could be the source of her power?
...I'm reminded of her threat to Sir Cyrus.|She threatened to reanimate Sir Cyrus...|Do you think he managed to get away?
...I hope so.|If we had to face teach...I don't know what I would do.
With these weapons Sir Aesc gave us...|{var:MC_Name}!
Let's vow to stop this Lilith person and rescue Sir Cyrus!| We'll do this for sure!
Alright! We'll stop Lilith and rescue teach!
Bandits so close to the main city...the Crimson Wolves...|I wonder what's happened to Greshia, it can't be good if bandits are operating so close.

Greshia's leader should have dispatched guards to defend their borders.|If bandits are so close, Greshia's leadership might have changed.|From what I remember, they used to be well-protected.|But that battle...

Those poor villagers....|I recognize that going after the leader was important but...|Was it worth ignoring the villagers' plea for help?|They've lost their homes.|.....|At least we stopped this group from going after others though.
I'm glad we saved those villages.|I know the leader escaped but...these villagers were going to lose their homes.
I still can't believe we've lost everything.|The villagers...|The bandit leader...|.....|I wonder what's become of the villagers now...
I still can't believe we pulled that off.|It was all thanks to your quick thinking.
It was a group effort.|All of us made it work.
Have you been to Greshia before, Schuri?
Mmhm. I have a few years ago.|Actually...there were talks of me marrying the lord's son.|So I went to Greshia to meet him.
You were going to be forced to marry?|That sounds...terrible.
My family is rather open and gives me veto power.|You can think of it more as a blind date. It didn't work out though...|What about you? Have you been to Greshia?
No, I haven't.|Most of my days were spent training so I haven't travelled around much.|Can you tell me more about it?

I see...|Greshia is a large city known for their trade.|It's in a prime location, intersected by many main roads.|From what I recall...the Lord seemed to treat their people well.|But...leadership seemed to have changed hands since then...|The old lord wouldn't have let it get so bad.
source:
add_portrait;Schuri;Right
speak;Schuri;Yes?
choice;SchuriConversation4;Which topic do you want to ask about?;Aesc,Lithrasir,Lilith;FLAG(backable);horizontal;top_left
if;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Lithrasir'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;PLACEHOLDER FOR YESTERDAY
    #####################################
elif;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Lilith'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;Lilith...We learned a little bit about her,|Yet all we've got is more questions.|Why is she trying to resurrect the demon king?|Could she have been corrupted by the Lathrasir?
    speak;MC;When we learned about the Lathrasir...|I thought that was the source of her power.|The fact that she didn't take it with her...|What on earth could be the source of her power?
speak;Schuri;...I'm reminded of her threat to Sir Cyrus.|She threatened to reanimate Sir Cyrus...|Do you think he managed to get away?
speak;MC;...I hope so.|If we had to face teach...I don't know what I would do.
speak;Schuri;With these weapons Sir Aesc gave us...|{var:MC_Name}!
bop_portrait;Schuri;
bop_portrait;MC
speak;MC;W-w-what's with the shouting voice?
speak;Schuri;Let's vow to stop this Lilith person and rescue Sir Cyrus!| We'll do this for sure!
bop_portrait;MC
speak;MC;Alright! We'll stop Lilith and rescue teach!
    ##################
elif;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation4'] == 'Aesc'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;Schuri;Sir Aesc...|So many questions
    ##################
end

if;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation2'] == 'Yesterday'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;MC;About yesterday...
    speak;Schuri;Bandits so close to the main city...the Crimson Wolves...|I wonder what's happened to Greshia, it can't be good if bandits are operating so close.
    speak;MC;How come?
    speak;Schuri;Greshia's leader should have dispatched guards to defend their borders.|If bandits are so close, Greshia's leadership might have changed.|From what I remember, they used to be well-protected.|But that battle...
    if;game.game_vars['_ch1VillageDestroyed'] == True and game.game_vars['_ch1BonesEscapeFlag'] == False
        speak;Schuri;Those poor villagers....|I recognize that going after the leader was important but...|Was it worth ignoring the villagers' plea for help?|They've lost their homes.|.....|At least we stopped this group from going after others though.
    elif;game.game_vars['_ch1VillageDestroyed'] == False and game.game_vars['_ch1BonesEscapeFlag'] == True
        speak;Schuri;I'm glad we saved those villages.|I know the leader escaped but...these villagers were going to lose their homes.
    elif;game.game_vars['_ch1VillageDestroyed'] == True and game.game_vars['_ch1BonesEscapeFlag'] == True
        expression;Schuri;HalfCloseEyes
        speak;Schuri;I still can't believe we've lost everything.|The villagers...|The bandit leader...|.....|I wonder what's become of the villagers now...
        expression;Schuri;NoSmile
    elif;game.game_vars['_ch1VillageDestroyed'] == False and game.game_vars['_ch1BonesEscapeFlag'] == False
        expression;Schuri;Smile
        speak;Schuri;I still can't believe we pulled that off.|It was all thanks to your quick thinking.
        speak;MC;It was a group effort.|All of us made it work.
        expression;Schuri;Smile
    end
elif;game.game_vars['SchuriConversation2'] == 'Greshia'
    add_portrait;MC;Left
    speak;MC;Have you been to Greshia before, Schuri?
    speak;Schuri;Mmhm. I have a few years ago.|Actually...there were talks of me marrying the lord's son.|So I went to Greshia to meet him.
    speak;MC;You were going to be forced to marry?|That sounds...terrible.
    speak;Schuri;My family is rather open and gives me veto power.|You can think of it more as a blind date. It didn't work out though...|What about you? Have you been to Greshia?
    speak;MC;No, I haven't.|Most of my days were spent training so I haven't travelled around much.|Can you tell me more about it?
    speak;Schuri;I see...|Greshia is a large city known for their trade.|It's in a prime location, intersected by many main roads.|From what I recall...the Lord seemed to treat their people well.|But...leadership seemed to have changed hands since then...|The old lord wouldn't have let it get so bad.
end
